attributes.action: MAKE TRESPASSING ON PROPERTY IN ENGLAND A CRIMINAL OFFENCE AS IN SCOTLAND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UPGRADE THE OFFENCE OF TRESPASS IN ENGLAND FROM A CIVIL OFFENCE TO A CRIMINAL OFFENCE LIKE IT IS IN SCOTLAND.
AT THE MOMENT IT IS LEFT TO THE PROPERTY OWNER TO DEAL WITH TRESPASSERS NOT THE POLICE.
MAKING IT A CRIMINAL OFFENCE WILL GIVE PROPERTY OWNERS THE RIGHTS THEY SHOULD HAVE.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
